content: bicolor crafted from soft yarn these scrunchies are easy and quick to make you can create them in any color and scrunchies choose between a simple design or a wavy style making them a lovely handmade gift for both loved ones and yourself by yarnseed design 1 design 2 level very easy brand erica zeeman quantity 1 mustard yellow yarn or yarns material 58% cotton 42% acryl 1 salmon pink yarn 1 white yarns 1 yarn = 50g = 66m gauge 28rows x 22stitches = 10cm x 10cm crochet hook 6mm tools hair tie 5cm diameter needle st stitch chain chain double_crochet double_crochet abbreviations slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet cc color change page 2 if you are using a hair tie with a different diameter make sure to add or subtract number of row and stitches in the designs design1 for every additional/decremental 1cm in the diameter add/subtract 10rows 5rows in each color design2 for every additional/decremental 1cm in the diameter add/subtract 8 stitches instructions for design 1 row 1 using the white yarn do a slip knot then ch7 row 2 skip the first st and single_crochet in the next 6 stitches row 3-row 27 ch1 and single_crochet in the next 6 stitches repeat 24 times row 27-row 52 cc to mustard yellow or salmon pink then ch1 and single_crochet in the next 6 stitches repeat 25 times ----------------------------your work should be 18cm long----------------------------- row 5 juxtapose both ends and using the same thread on the hook ch1 and do a slip_stitch in the 6 stitches connecting both ends fold your work into two or juxtapose both ends then hold the work with the hair tie putting it in the middle using the same mustard yellow or salmon pink thread ch1 then insert the hook through the first st on the other side of the tie then into the same st of the hook and do a single_crochet the goal is to connect both borders and hide the hair tie with the same color single_crochet in the next 23st s through both borders sealing the hair tie in the middle cc to white finish the round by single_crochet in the remaining 24 st s fasten_off and weave in ends of all your work instructions for design 2 round 1 with the white yarn do a slip knot then 40sc around the hair tie and slip_stitch in the first st of the round round 2 ch1 and single_crochet in all 40 st s of the first round first wave cc to mustard yellow or salmon pink ch1 and do a single_crochet in the next 3st s then ch4 and turn your work to do a slip_stitch in the first st of the round ch1 and turn your work again and do 7dc around the just made chain see photos in page 3 for more clarification page 3 remaining waves 1sc in the next 4st then ch4 turn your work and do a slip_stitch around the previous chain made ch1 and turn
